title: PowerShell Enterprise MCP Server Tools Reference
body: Enterprise PowerShell MCP Server provides 6 core tools for secure PowerShell execution: 1) powershell-command - Execute single PowerShell commands with security classification (SAFE/RISKY/DANGEROUS/CRITICAL/BLOCKED), 2) powershell-script - Execute multi-line PowerShell scripts with timeout and working directory control, 3) powershell-file - Execute PowerShell script files with parameter support, 4) powershell-syntax-check - Validate PowerShell syntax without execution for pre-flight validation, 5) help - Comprehensive documentation and AI agent integration guidance, 6) ai-agent-test - Validation testing framework with basic/security/monitoring/comprehensive test suites. All tools support authentication keys, confirmation parameters for risky operations, timeout control, and comprehensive audit logging with security assessments.
